verses.text: And the word of the \sc Lord\sc* came unto me, saying,
Son of man, prophesy against the prophets of Israel that prophesy, and say thou unto them that prophesy out of their own hearts, Hear ye the word of the \sc Lord\sc*;
thus saith the Lord \sc God\sc*; Woe unto the foolish prophets, that follow their own spirit, and have seen nothing!
O Israel, thy prophets are like the foxes in the deserts.
Ye have not gone up into the gaps, neither made up the hedge for the house of Israel to stand in the battle in the day of the \sc Lord\sc*.

They have seen vanity and lying divination, saying, The \sc Lord\sc* saith: and the \sc Lord\sc* hath not sent them: and they have made \add others\add* to hope that \add they\add* would confirm the word.
Have ye not seen a vain vision, and have ye not spoken a lying divination, whereas ye say, The \sc Lord\sc* saith \add it;\add* albeit I have not spoken?
Therefore thus saith the Lord \sc God\sc*; Because ye have spoken vanity, and seen lies, therefore behold, I \add am\add* against you, saith the Lord \sc God\sc*.

And mine hand shall be upon the prophets that see vanity, and that divine lies: they shall not be in the assembly of my people, neither shall they be written in the writing of the house of Israel, neither shall they enter into the land of Israel; and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the Lord \sc God\sc*.
Because, even because they have seduced my people, saying, Peace; and \add there was\add* no peace; and one built up a wall, and lo, others daubed it \add with\add* untempered \add morter:\add*

say unto them which daub \add it with\add* untempered \add morter\add*, that it shall fall: there shall be an overflowing shower; and ye, O great hailstones, shall fall; and a stormy wind shall rent \add it\add*.
Lo, when the wall is fallen, shall it not be said unto you, Where \add is\add* the daubing where\add with\add* ye have daubed \add it?\add*

Therefore thus saith the Lord \sc God\sc*; I will even rent \add it with\add* a stormy wind in my fury; and there shall be an overflowing shower in mine anger, and great hailstones in \add my\add* fury to consume \add it\add*.

So will I break down the wall that ye have daubed \add with\add* untempered \add morter\add*, and bring it down to the ground, so that the foundation thereof shall be discovered, and it shall fall, and ye shall be consumed in the midst thereof: and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \sc Lord\sc*.

Thus will I accomplish my wrath upon the wall, and upon them that have daubed it \add with\add* untempered \add morter\add*, and will say unto you, The wall \add is\add* no \add more\add*, neither they that daubed it;
\add to wit\add*, the prophets of Israel which prophesy concerning Jerusalem, and which see visions of peace for her, and \add there is\add* no peace, saith the Lord \sc God\sc*.
Likewise thou son of man, set thy face against the daughters of thy people, which prophesy out of their own heart; and prophesy thou against them,

and say, Thus saith the Lord \sc God\sc*; Woe to \add the women\add* that sew pillows to all armholes, and make kerchiefs upon the head of every stature to hunt souls! Will ye hunt the souls of my people, and will ye save the souls alive \add that come\add* unto you?

And will ye pollute me among my people for handfuls of barley and for pieces of bread, to slay the souls that should not die, and to save the souls alive that should not live, by your lying to my people that hear \add your\add* lies?

Wherefore thus saith the Lord \sc God\sc*; Behold, I \add am\add* against your pillows, where\add with\add* ye there hunt the souls to make \add them\add* fly, and I will tear them from your arms, and will let the souls go, \add even\add* the souls that ye hunt to make \add them\add* fly.
Your kerchiefs also will I tear, and deliver my people out of your hand, and they shall be no more in your hand to be hunted; and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \sc Lord\sc*.

Because \add with\add* lies \add ye\add* have made the heart of the righteous sad, whom I have not made sad; and strengthened the hands of the wicked, that \add he\add* should not return from his wicked way, by promising him life:
therefore ye shall see no more vanity, nor divine divinations: for I will deliver my people out of your hand: and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the \sc Lord\sc*.
